h2.span: Sub: Undertaking and request for Issuance of Export permit.

div.p: We do here by certifying that the goods as described in the Invoice No. Date , for USD: . been manufactured in our factory in Adamjee port Processing Zone Adamjee Nagar, Shiddhirgonj,Narayangonj. In accordance with the approval of the authority ,at present international market price against LC DATED ,other undertake that we shall abide by the rules and regulations of the Government and BEPZA in connection with the export and held liable in case of any default. Being duly authorized by the board of Directors of our Company, the undersigned issues the above statement on behalf of the Company. In view of the above, please issue us the Export permit.
